title: The Casanova Killer /// Part 1 /// 398
description:
The Casanova Killer /// Part 1 /// 398

Part 1 of 2


www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

Many people know about Serial Killers Bundy, Gacy, and Dahmer. But here’s one that when you hear about his life and crimes, you will be shocked that his is not a household name. This week we discuss a brutal killer Paul John Knowles.
